price: 56. Tozali kopesa bango bolamu na lombango. Kasi bazali koyeba te.
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
